all_text_timv: 880-01 Īrān nāmah / Bunyād-i Muṭālaʻāt-i Īrān. Iran nameh Īrānʹnāmah Issues for summer 2016- have title: Iran namag Washington, D.C. : Bunyād Muṭālaʻāt-i Īrān, [1982]- 1986-2016: Bethesda, MD : Foundation for Iranian Studies 2016-: [Toronto] : [University of Toronto] volumes : illustrations ; 23 cm Four issues per year text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier Began with Sāl-i 1., shumārah-ʼi 1 (Pāʼīz 1361 [1982]); ceased with: Sāl-i 30, shumārah-ʼi 4 (zimistān 1394 [2016]). Began with New series, Vol. 1, no. 1 (spring 2016). Title from cover. Issue for Spring 2016 reissued by the Toronto publisher with the title Iran Namag, and the numbering Volume 1, Number 1. Reissue has slightly different content. The Foundation for Iranian Studies stopped its support of the journal in winter 2016.  It was relaunched in spring 2016 as an independent journal based at the University of Toronto. "New series" designation dropped with Vol. 1, no. 2 (summer 2016). Tables of contents and abstracts also available online via the World Wide Web. Persian and English. Latest issue consulted: New ser., Vol. 1, no. 1 (spring 2016). Iran Periodicals. Iran Civilization Periodicals. 880-02 Foundation for Iranian Studies (Bethesda, Md.) general_note_ssm: Issue for Spring 2016 reissued by the Toronto publisher with the title Iran Namag, and the numbering Volume 1, Number 1. Reissue has slightly different content.
special_numbering_ssm: The Foundation for Iranian Studies stopped its support of the journal in winter 2016.  It was relaunched in spring 2016 as an independent journal based at the University of Toronto.
"New series" designation dropped with Vol. 1, no. 2 (summer 2016).
other_forms_ssm: Tables of contents and abstracts also available online via the World Wide Web.
dates_of_pub_ssim: Began with Sāl-i 1., shumārah-ʼi 1 (Pāʼīz 1361 [1982]); ceased with: Sāl-i 30, shumārah-ʼi 4 (zimistān 1394 [2016]). Began with New series, Vol. 1, no. 1 (spring 2016).
